divs: Sighting DetailsMy dog awoke me at approx. 4:30 a.m. was wining. About 1 minute after awaking to my dog, my bed (only thing that I noticed) was shaking -- quite a bit. I know this sounds crazy! I thought we were having an earthquake. It must have just been my bed shaking. The walls are not cracked. Once the shaking and rumbling stopped I noticed outside... My blinds were lifted so I could see outside as I was laying on my side -- I saw a circle with lights, swirling (it was so fast) the outside was glowing like it was on fire (was disc shaped appeared flat). I thought it was something that was going to crash. This object was not far off the ground; I want to say about 10-15 feet. I called the police. My 911 call did not register (on phone calls made) and there was static on the line for a brief period. I had asked the dispatch officer if they could hear me -- they said yes, so I thought it was on my end. I just noticed on my cell phone when checking to see exact time I called the police and noticed the call back from the officer was registered on my phone (not the 911 call).
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Milan
There were no other sightings in Milan on or around December 8th 2011
